oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bushman genealogies, undated. Some brief descriptions and personal histories, such as where individuals worked, came from, who they married, how many children they had and so on. Information about different groups such as the 'Vaalpens'. Names of people according to huts they occupy (10 of them), also some numbers next to their names.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dorothea Bleek - Book BC151_A3_032
